resources.string: You can unlock all songs in %s by playing reward ads.\nAre you sure you want to play it?
You can unlock all songs by playing reward ads.\nAre you sure you want to play it?
Are you sure you want to lock the %s?\n\nNote: You will need to play the reward ad when you unlock it again.
Unlock without playing ads because there is no ad inventory.
Cannot launch the VGS emulator.\nALL SONGS ARE LOCKED.
Communication with the server has failed. (status code: %d)
All songs are up to date.\nThe first update information for new songs will be posted on my Twitter, so please follow me if you like.
Only the song list has been updated. No new songs have been added.
There are songs that have not yet been downloaded. Do you want to download them first because you will need to unlock them again after downloading?
Purchase of this product will allow you to unlock songs without playing reward video ads. Once purchased, this product can be used permanently on your Google Account.

Purchase of this product will eliminate the banner ads at the top of the screen and the interstitial ads during shuffle playback. Because these ads are important for us to avoid operating at a loss, they are priced at a high level. Once purchased, this product can be used permanently on your Google Account.
This music is not yet available on AppleMusic.
